Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-8114 affecting package libssh for versions less than 0.10.6-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-8114 affecting package libssh for versions less than 0.10.6-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libssh is earlier than 0.10.6-5, affected by CVE-2025-8114
